overview: Serene is convinced her wife Krissy is cheating on her. She follows her one day and confirms her suspicious then makes a plan to get even with her.  it's Kenna's wedding day but she won't come out of her room. As the guests arrive, her best friend Gina heads up to the room to try to get her to come out. What will she have to do to make her come downstairs?  Dava likes to meet up with random women to hook up while her wife Adria watches via live stream. When Georgia arrives, she's totally down to give Adria a show she'll remember.  Angela heard that her husband's sister Cherie used to be a party girl when she was younger and anxiously awaits her arrival. Her husband gets called out to the office giving Angela the perfect chance to make her move.
tagline: It's not cheating if it's with another woman...
title: Lesbian Cheating Wives
